items.title: [COLOR White]Jim Browning[/COLOR]
items.summary: Tracking and identifying scammers who knock my front door, call me or shove popups onto my computer screen.

items.title: [COLOR White]Scammer Payback[/COLOR]
items.summary: Scammers are ruthless, and that is why I am here.  My channel is all about bringing awareness to this critical problem with humor and fun.  We will learn a lot of things along the way and if I help one person through this, it will be worth it.
